EXECUTIVE MEETINGS: Everything will be the way you like
details: Once our dishes are gone, will not be rest until they reach you.Our menus have been carefully designed to impress you, and we would be pleased to get you know the way we manage your special and general events through the hotel's sales and marketing department. It would be our pleasure to provide you with advice on your preferences.
hallsD: Awaliv International Hotel contains a huge visual theater, in addition to the halls of events, meetings and training courses, equipped with all audio-visual means, appropriate for all personal and practical events, coupled with a special design and an offer includes menus for each event, as we promise you to have a memorable event. Contact with sales and marketing department to enquire about anything.
